text: Yakima Meadows was a horse racing track located in Yakima, Washington. The track closed in 1998 after 37 years of operation. It is a one-mile (1.6 km) dirt oval with seating for about 3,500 fans. == References == Category:Defunct sports venues in Washington (state) Category:Buildings and structures in Yakima, Washington Category:Defunct horse racing venues in the United States
title: Yakima Meadows
